North Melbourne remains in touch with the AFLW pace setters following a dominant 35-point win over Richmond at Punt Road Oval.
<ul><li>The Kangaroos moved to provisional fifth position on the ladder… [+2673 chars]

articles.author: Zalika Rizmal
articles.title: Melbourne Football Club supporters' group to host event at male-only club - ABC News
articles.description: One of the club's key fan groups is holding its season launch at a male-only members club one day after International Women's Day.
articles.content:
A group closely affiliated with Melbourne Football Club is planning its season launch event at one of the country's oldest male-only members clubs, the Australian Club in Melbourne.
